scripts.BUILD: npm run CLEAR_DIST && npm run html_min && npm run less && npm run purifycss && npm run uglifyjs && npm run optimize_img && ./pagefind --site dist && npm run copy && echo 'BUILD COMPLETE'
scripts.html_min: html-minifier-terser ./index.html -o dist/index.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js true && html-minifier-terser --input-dir sections/css/ --output-dir dist/sections/css/ --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js true && html-minifier-terser --input-dir sections/etc/ --output-dir dist/sections/etc --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js true && html-minifier-terser --input-dir sections/html/ --output-dir dist/sections/html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js true && html-minifier-terser --input-dir sections/javascript/ --output-dir dist/sections/javascript --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js true
scripts.copy: cp ./*.{ico,png} ./dist & mv ./img/new/*.* ./img/src/ & mkdir ./dist/img & cp ./img/forDist/*.* ./dist/img/ & cp -r ./fonts ./dist & cp ./img/*.* ./dist/img/ & cp ./.htaccess ./dist
